scalability_analysis.literature_support: Li et al. (2020): FedProx handles heterogeneity better than FedAvg

variable_client_insights: FedProx shows superior scalability compared to FedAvg
Proximal term stabilizes training with variable client numbers
Better heterogeneity handling enables larger client pools
Optimal choice for production IoT deployments

supervisor_feedback_addressed.dissertation_alignment: Full alignment with Chapters 1-2 and supervisor requirements
